thread.title: Warriors’ Andre Iguodala finds 6th-man role in his comfort zone
thread.title_full: Warriors’ Andre Iguodala finds 6th-man role in his comfort zone - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Warriors’ Andre Iguodala finds 6th-man role in his comfort zone
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala against Toronto Raptors during Warriors' 95-87 win in NBA preseason game at SAP Center in San Jose, Calif., on Monday, October 5, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala against Toronto Raptors...
He already has been named the MVP of the NBA Finals. Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala against Toronto Raptors during Warriors' 95-87 win in NBA preseason game at SAP Center in San Jose, Calif., on Monday, October 5, 2015. Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala against Toronto Raptors...
He already has been named the MVP of the NBA Finals.
